languages.text: Бунт черни, спровоцированный очередным снижением возраста труда на мануфакторумах, охватил большую часть шпилей центрального города-улья. Силы Империума прибыли слишком поздно, чтобы оперативно погасить огонь восстания, однако силам Астра Милитарум удалось блокировать взбунтовавшийся улей.

The peasant uprising, provoked by the latest lowering of the minimum age for manufactorum workers, spread throughout most of the spire of the central hive city. Imperial forces arrived too late to extinguish the flame of rebellion — however, the Astra Militarum succeeded in blockading the rogue hive.
languages.original_text: Бунт черни, спровоцированный очередным снижением возраста труда на мануфакторумах, охватил большую часть шпилей центрального города-улья. Силы Империума прибыли слишком поздно, чтобы оперативно погасить огонь восстания, однако силам Астра Милитарум удалось блокировать взбунтовавшийся улей.

traits.locale_text: The peasant uprising, provoked by the latest lowering of the minimum age for manufactorum workers, spread throughout most of the spire of the central hive city. Imperial forces arrived too late to extinguish the flame of rebellion — however, the Astra Militarum succeeded in blockading the rogue hive.

The peasant uprising, provoked by the latest lowering of the minimum age for manufactorum workers, spread throughout most of the spire of the central hive city. Imperial forces arrived too late to extinguish the flame of rebellion — however, the Astra Militarum succeeded in blockading the rogue hive.

The peasant uprising, provoked by the latest lowering of the minimum age for manufactorum workers, spread throughout most of the spire of the central hive city. Imperial forces arrived too late to extinguish the flame of rebellion — however, the Astra Militarum succeeded in blockading the rogue hive.

The peasant uprising, provoked by the latest lowering of the minimum age for manufactorum workers, spread throughout most of the spire of the central hive city. Imperial forces arrived too late to extinguish the flame of rebellion — however, the Astra Militarum succeeded in blockading the rogue hive.

languages.text: 政府当局降低了制造工厂招工的最低年龄，激怒了劳苦大众。这场起义蔓延到了巢都中央区域的绝大部分尖塔。帝国军队到达得太迟，已经无法扑灭叛乱的火焰。不过，星界军成功地封锁了这座发生叛乱的巢都。
languages.original_text: The peasant uprising, provoked by the latest lowering of the minimum age for manufactorum workers, spread throughout most of the spire of the central hive city. Imperial forces arrived too late to extinguish the flame of rebellion — however, the Astra Militarum succeeded in blockading the rogue hive.

traits.locale_text: 政府当局降低了制造工厂招工的最低年龄，激怒了劳苦大众。这场起义蔓延到了巢都中央区域的绝大部分尖塔。帝国军队到达得太迟，已经无法扑灭叛乱的火焰。不过，星界军成功地封锁了这座发生叛乱的巢都。

languages.text: El alzamiento campesino, provocado por la reducción más reciente de la edad mínima para trabajar en el manufactorum, se extendió por la torre de la ciudad colmena central. Las fuerzas imperiales llegaron tarde para sofocar las llamas de la rebelión, pero el Astra Militarum logró bloquear la colmena rebelde.
languages.original_text: The peasant uprising, provoked by the latest lowering of the minimum age for manufactorum workers, spread throughout most of the spire of the central hive city. Imperial forces arrived too late to extinguish the flame of rebellion — however, the Astra Militarum succeeded in blockading the rogue hive.

traits.locale_text: El alzamiento campesino, provocado por la reducción más reciente de la edad mínima para trabajar en el manufactorum, se extendió por la torre de la ciudad colmena central. Las fuerzas imperiales llegaron tarde para sofocar las llamas de la rebelión, pero el Astra Militarum logró bloquear la colmena rebelde.

languages.text: 聖工場労働者の最低年齢の引き下げを受けて発生した農民の反乱は、中央多層都市の尖塔のほとんどの地域に広がった。帝国軍の到着は反乱を鎮火するには遅すぎた 。しかし、帝国防衛軍はローグ・ハイヴの封鎖に成功した。
languages.original_text: The peasant uprising, provoked by the latest lowering of the minimum age for manufactorum workers, spread throughout most of the spire of the central hive city. Imperial forces arrived too late to extinguish the flame of rebellion — however, the Astra Militarum succeeded in blockading the rogue hive.

traits.locale_text: 聖工場労働者の最低年齢の引き下げを受けて発生した農民の反乱は、中央多層都市の尖塔のほとんどの地域に広がった。帝国軍の到着は反乱を鎮火するには遅すぎた 。しかし、帝国防衛軍はローグ・ハイヴの封鎖に成功した。

languages.text: Der Bauernaufstand, der durch die jüngste Herabsetzung des Mindestalters für Manufakturarbeiter ausgelöst worden war, breitete sich über den größten Teil der Spitze der zentralen Hive-Stadt aus. Die kaiserlichen Streitkräfte kamen zu spät, um die Flamme der Rebellion zu löschen — dennoch gelang es der Astra Militarum, den abtrünnigen Hive zu blockieren.
languages.original_text: The peasant uprising, provoked by the latest lowering of the minimum age for manufactorum workers, spread throughout most of the spire of the central hive city. Imperial forces arrived too late to extinguish the flame of rebellion — however, the Astra Militarum succeeded in blockading the rogue hive.

traits.locale_text: The peasant uprising, provoked by the latest lowering of the minimum age for manufactorum workers, spread throughout most of the spire of the central hive city. Imperial forces arrived too late to extinguish the flame of rebellion — however, the Astra Militarum succeeded in blockading the rogue hive.

languages.text: La révolte paysanne, provoquée par un nouvel abaissement de l'âge minimum des ouvriers de manufactorum, s'est propagée dans la majeure partie de la tour de la cité-ruche centrale. Les forces impériales sont intervenues trop tard pour souffler la flamme de la rébellion, mais l'Astra Militarum est parvenu à bloquer la ruche dissidente.
languages.original_text: The peasant uprising, provoked by the latest lowering of the minimum age for manufactorum workers, spread throughout most of the spire of the central hive city. Imperial forces arrived too late to extinguish the flame of rebellion — however, the Astra Militarum succeeded in blockading the rogue hive.

traits.locale_text: La révolte paysanne, provoquée par un nouvel abaissement de l'âge minimum des ouvriers de manufactorum, s'est propagée dans la majeure partie de la tour de la cité-ruche centrale. Les forces impériales sont intervenues trop tard pour souffler la flamme de la rébellion, mais l'Astra Militarum est parvenu à bloquer la ruche dissidente.
